bill.title: George County; authorize to issue bonds and levy tax for county sports and recreation complex.
bill.description: An Act To Authorize The George County Board Of Supervisors To Issue General Obligation Bonds For The Purpose Of Acquiring, Constructing, Equipping, Furnishing, Operating And Maintaining A County Sports And Recreation Complex; To Provide For A Tax Upon Gross Proceeds Of Sales In George County, Which Shall Be Expended By The Board Of Supervisors To Retire The Bonds; To Provide That The Tax Shall Be Collected By The State Tax Commission And Paid To George County; To Provide That The Bonds Shall Not Be Issued And The Tax Shall Not Be Imposed Unless Approved At An Election Held In The County On That Question; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To Local and Private Legislation;Ways and Means
